name: @ksf-media/user
description: User component for KSF Media apps

scripts.build-npm: spago build -u '--output ../../output' && cp -R ../../output output && spago bundle-module --no-build -m KSF.User.JS -t build.js && parcel build --no-source-maps -d build ../../less/Registration.less ../../less/Login.less ../../less/Button.less ../../less/ksf-utils.less ../../less/InputField.less
